Articles.Content: You realise that the vacuum around doesn't annihilate because it's antivacuum. It's not just nothing but antinothing.

I use my something-inator and it builds a planet around the hill, and you all get trapped in the new planet

My hill

I ask the planet to leave.

my hill.

i build a death star around it and annihilate your hill

i build a new hill

my hill

Since I said in the how popular are you thread that this is my hill it is now mine.

my hill.

But you need to remember that in that thread, i said not for long

So it’s now my hill

I hire Jeb using 10 snacks and a saturn v to use BD armoury’s nukes to defend the hill

**Edited <time datetime="2021-08-29T07:20:24Z" title="08/29/2021 07:20  AM" data-short="2 yr">August 29, 2021</time> by Space Kerbalisation Tech**

I bribe Jeb by giving him 30 snacks and two SpaceX Starships to "forget" to guard the hill. 

My hill

I bribe CNSA to drop a stage on Jeb and his starships. They explode.   

my hill

**Edited <time datetime="2021-08-29T19:00:59Z" title="08/29/2021 07:00  PM" data-short="2 yr">August 29, 2021</time> by Spaceman.Spiff**

The stage was hypergolic.

A toxic hill.

I bring in my RD-275 guy and use the hypergolic fuel to launch a rocket to another unclaimed hill

My hill

I bribe the kraken using 100 heavy part count kraken bait ships to take over and guard the hill

My hill

I throw Danny2462 at the hill and run away. 5 months later I return to claim the hill.

my spaghetti hill.

I eat the spaghetti.

My hill

[@Spaceman.Spiff](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/209133-spacemanspiff/) getting CNSA to kill Jeb does not change that the hill is mine.

Still my hill

I nuke it (for the 1000th time)

My hill

I take the rubble from you nuking the hill to build a new hill.   

my crumbly hill

Due to the low structural integrity of post nuclear explosion rubble, your hill collapses and i build a new one

my hill

i arm it with spacex starship to protect it

A hill surrounded by starship parts to protect it.

Spoiler

![Lucas_Simms_house.jpg](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/fallout/images/9/9c/Lucas_Simms_house.jpg)

Megaton Hill.

I detonate a 1 megaton nuclear bomb, vaporising the hill.

I make a new hill.

My hill.

I shift the hill out of sync with regular space time, meaning it can't be seen or affected by anything in the normal world.

My invisible, untouchable hill.

I ignore your weird quantum hill and build my own, normal hill.

My totally normal hill.

Total. Normal.

The Totalitarian Normality Hill.

I bring GLORIOUS REVOLUTION to your hill and now it is just anither type of totalitarianism

My communist dictatorship hill
It's KSP. So, commÜnist dictatorship hill. With the umlaut.

The umlaut is a smily face in disguise and so the happy people rise up and form a Democracy.

My happily elected hill.
